            Liang Fu
          
          
            
              Welcome to my personal website!
              I am a PhD candidate at Department of Economics, University at Albany, SUNY. My research focus on monetary policy and international trade.

articles.title: Research
articles.contents:
Research Papers
Monetary Policy Surprises and Interest Rates under China’s Evolving Monetary Policy Framework (with Chun-Yu Ho) [August 2021, Revision Requested]
Political Stability and Credibility of Currency Board (with Shu Feng, Chun-Yu Ho and Wai-Yip Alex Ho) [May 2021, Under Review]
Real Exchange Rate and Innovation: Firm-Level Evidence from China (with Chun-Yu Ho and Xiaoli Zhang) [Jan. 2021]

articles.title: Resources
articles.contents:
Latex
Generate tables: https://www.tablesgenerator.com/
Count words: https://app.uio.no/ifi/texcount/
R
R
An Introduction to R: Introduction to base R
https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.pdf

Advanced R: Programming in R
https://adv-r.hadley.nz/


Data Science
R for Data Science
http://r4ds.had.co.nz/

R Programming for Data Science
https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/rprogdatascience/

R for Data Analytics
https://rforanalytics.com/


Data Visualization
ggplot2 - Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis: R package for data visualization based on the grammar of graphics
http://moderngraphics11.pbworks.com/f/ggplot2-Book09hWickham.pdf

A Layered Grammar of Graphics
https://byrneslab.net/classes/biol607/readings/wickham_layered-grammar.pdf

Data Visualization - A Practical Introduction：Data visualization using ggplot2
http://socviz.co/


Markdown
The Markdown Guide
https://www.markdownguide.org/

R Markdown
https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/index.html


Version Control
Happy Git and GitHub for the useR
https://happygitwithr.com/
